Plot: Takes place in the days before Christmas near a little-known border crossing on the Mohawk reservation between New York State and Quebec. Here, the lure of fast money from smuggling ...
Title: Frozen River
Actors: Melissa Leo, Misty Upham, Charlie McDermott, Michael O'Keefe
tomatoConsensus: Veteran character actress Melissa Leo delivers a stunning performance in this powerful -- if grim -- indie film.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 32 wins & 36 nominations.
